original: Åkerberg, Ragnar Odvar, verkst. direktör, Jönköping, f. 19/6/96 i Eskilstuna av kamr. Carl Å. O’. Amanda Persson. G. 1. 20 m. Agnes Björk-qvist, d. 44; 2. 46 m. Rut Dahlström. — Anst. v. Tryck. A-B Folket 12-27 s. faktor o. annonschef, ekonomichef o. verkst. dir. v. Tryck A-B Aurora 27-41, ekanomichef o. verkst. dir. i Tryck. A-B Småland sed. 41. Led. av styr. f. Tryck. A-B Småland sed. 42, av styr. f. A-B Samor§:anis. i Sthlm sed. 42, av styr. f. Smålandskrets, av Sv. tidn:-utgifören., led. av Jönköp. stads bygg-n :nd sed. 47, v. ordf. där sed. 48, led. av Ystads stadsfullm. 31-41, av Ystads drätsielkamm. 33-41, av styr. f. Ystads Saltsjöbad 30-41, av styr. f. Ystads folksk. 32-41, led. av stadsrev. i Ystad 28-33. Medarb. i tidskr. o. dagspress. Sign.: Ragnar Odvarson, R. A-g. Hobby: målning.
translated: Åkerberg, Ragnar Odvar, managing director, Jönköping, b. 19/6/96 in Eskilstuna to comrade Carl Å. O.’ Amanda Persson. M. 1. 20 m. Agnes Björk-qvist, d. 44; 2. 46 m. Rut Dahlström. — Employed at Tryck AB Folket 12-27 as a factor and advertising manager, economic manager and managing director at Tryck AB Aurora 27-41, economic manager and managing director at Tryck AB Småland since 41. Member of the board of Tryck AB Småland since 42, board member of AB Samor§:anis in Stockholm since 42, board member of Smålandskrets, member of the Swedish newspaper publishers, member of the Jönköping city building committee since 47, vice chairman there since 48, member of the Ystad city council 31-41, member of the Ystad executive board 33-41, board member of Ystads Saltsjöbad 30-41, board member of Ystads folkskola 32-41, member of the city audit committee in Ystad 28-33. Contributor to magazines and daily press. Signature: Ragnar Odvarson, R. A-g. Hobby: painting.
